Text:
is anyone having this problem?
i copied the crack in the right place.

after i get through all of the registation of name, password, secret question, uncheck (i have previously purchased...) i get an error during submission (error 10013), this is still only the first step and i can't get any further.

i have windows 7 64bit.

anyone have a tip for me?

thanks.

forget it. i'm a dope.
i was still running peerblocker while trying to register.

now it works great! thanks a lot.

@catflap

haha

yea i just finished installing it on a windows 7 computer instead of on my xp and it worked fine so i didnt know the cause of your problem.

I'm glad you could figure it out
Thanks downloading. I wonder how this compares with digsby.

the only thing i don't like about it
is that the fonts on the program are very small.

i don't mean the chat windows, i haven't chatted with anyone yet. but i mean the typeface on the program itself is very small and i haven't found a way to increase the size.

Virus or unwanted program 'BDS/Infexor.IS [backdoor]'
detected in file 'C:\Program Files\Trillian\trillian.exe.

This popped up right after install/crack.  Scanned the torrent, and found the same thing  in the cracked exe.

Just a heads up.

@DAMskill

I'm using Avira, and my roommate is using Avast.  Scanned the file on both computers with the same result.
It's a crack, so some antiviruses will say it's infected.

Peerblocker? Does that even work nowadays?
as alexisthebest said. Its not infected. It just happens with cracks.

I've been using cracked programs for a long time.  Very few things on my comp aren't from this site.  I know cracks will sometimes show false positives.

But (as of now) three different AV programs on three computers?  That somehow makes me doubt it's a false positive.
Thanks A Milli. This Program Works Fine. My Anti Virus (Avast) Didn't Pick Up Any Viruses Or Anything
working thanks..so how can i remove my trillian account and the other msn,yahoo accounts which i set up using it because i can't find any account removal process on the website or the client..:-S
We have to know, is this immune from those awful forced updates that Cerulean Studios likes to pull on people?  It trips things out every time, requiring yet ANOTHER new crack.
Virus.  Not a false positive.  Actual side-effects witnessed.  Probably keylogging, account hijacking.
